name: Mallu Manager V3
description: Telegram Group Management Bot Written In Python for Making your LIFE Easier.

LOGGER.description: Do you Want a log. Set True/False

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

TOKEN.description: BOT TOKEN. This var used to be API_KEY but it is now TOKEN, adjust accordingly.

OWNER_ID.description: If you dont know, run the bot and do /id in your private chat with it, also an integer

SUPPORT_CHAT.description: Your own group for support, do not add the @

JOIN_LOGGER.description: Prints any new group the bot is added to, prints just the name and ID

EVENT_LOGS.description: Prints information like gbans, sudo promotes, AI enabled disable states that may help in debugging and shit

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Example; go to support.spamwat.ch to get key

DRAGONS.description: List of id's -  (not usernames) for users which have sudo access to the bot.

DEV_USERS.description: List of id's - (not usernames) for developers who will have the same perms as the owner

DEMONS.description: List of id's (not usernames) for users which are allowed to gban, but can also be banned.

TIGERS.description: List of id's (not usernames) for users which WONT be banned/kicked by the bot

DEL_CMDS.description: Delete commands that users dont have access to, like delete /ban if a non admin uses it.

BAN_STICKER.description: banhammer marie sticker id, the bot will send this sticker before banning or kicking a user in chat.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Allow ! commands as well as / (Leave this to true so that blacklist can work)

TIME_API_KEY.description: Get your API key from https://timezonedb.com/api

WALL_API.description: For wallpapers, get one from https://wall.alphacoders.com/api.php

BL_CHATS.description: List of groups that you want blacklisted.

SPAMMERS.description: List of id's (not usernames) of Spammers you want to block
